title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 502 - Floodplain Management Criteria For State Projects
content:

State Regulations
§ 502.1 - Purpose
§ 502.2 - Definitions
§ 502.3 - Determination of flood hazard area boundaries and base flood elevations

§ 502.6 - Disposition of state property

§ 502.8 - Variance provisions for state agencies

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 502

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 3-0301, art. 36

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
